DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate new indication Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation ( TMS ) conduct pilot randomized-controlled trial ( RCT ) compare structural neuronavigation-directed TMS Sham-TMS Placebo therapy treatment Generalized Anxiety Disorder ( GAD ) .
DOC.brief_title: Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation Treatment Generalized Anxiety Disorder
DOC.detailed_description: Participants complete structural MRI neuronavigation . Participants randomly assign treatment condition . TMS Sham-TMS session occur daily 5 days/week 6 week . Assessments occur pretreatment , weekly treatment , post-treatment , 3 month .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed GAD principal coprincipal disorder Clinical Global Impression Score ≥ 4 Hamilton Anxiety Rating Scale ≥ 18 Hamilton Rating Scale Depression ≤ 17 Fluency English Capacity understand nature study willingness sign inform consent form . History epilepsy head trauma ( LOC > 5 minute ) within past 6 month . Lifetime history increase intracranial pressure , seizure disorder , stroke , brain tumor , multiple sclerosis , brain surgery . A review patient medication study physician indicates increase risk seizure . An active autoimmune , endocrine , viral , vascular disorder affect brain ; unstable cardiac disease ; hypertension ; severe renal liver insufficiency . Substance use disorder PTSD within past 6 month . Lifetime bipolar disorder , obsessivecompulsive disorder ( OCD ) , psychotic disorder , mental retardation , pervasive developmental disorder . Any psychotic feature , include dementia delirium . Concurrent psychotherapy unwillingness discontinue Medication change within past 3 month . Current serious suicidal homicidal ideation , and/or serious suicidal attempt within past 6 month . Serious , unstable , terminal medical condition clinically judge psychiatrically unstable participate study . Any contraindication participation MRI scan
